trans-unit.source: Represents a field that displays custom content in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 表示在数据绑定控件中显示自定义内容的字段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> class is used by data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) to display custom content for each record displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>类由数据绑定控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) 以显示每个记录显示的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: When you need to display content in a data-bound control that is not provided by one of the predefined data control fields (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> class to create your custom user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 当你需要在未提供一个预定义的数据控件字段的数据绑定控件中显示内容 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>类来创建自定义用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>根据使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object as a column, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>为一列，对象和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件将其显示为一行。

trans-unit.source: You can define a custom template for the different parts of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object using the templates listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 你可以定义自定义模板的不同部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象使用下表中列出的模板。

trans-unit.source: Template
trans-unit.target: 模板

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content to display for the alternating items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定要为中的交替项显示的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content to display for an item in edit mode in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在编辑模式中的项显示的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content to display for the footer section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定要显示页脚部分的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content to display for the header section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定要显示标头部分的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content to display for an item in insert mode in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定要显示在插入模式中的项的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: This template is supported only by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此模板仅受<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content to display for the items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定要为中的项显示的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can hide a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object in a data-bound control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 可以隐藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>通过设置数据绑定控件中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative to defining a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.HeaderTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.FooterTemplate%2A> template, you can customize the header and footer sections of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object by setting other properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 作为定义自定义的替代方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.HeaderTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.FooterTemplate%2A>模板，你可以自定义的标头和表尾部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>通过设置的其他属性的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> property, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要在页眉或页脚部分中显示标题，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>属性，分别。

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是在标头部分中显示文本，你可以通过设置内显示图像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The header section can be hidden in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 可以在中隐藏的标头部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: 某些数据绑定控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件) 可显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual bound field.
trans-unit.target: 这些数据绑定控件不支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>单个绑定字段的属性。

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available).
trans-unit.target: 若要显示或隐藏的数据绑定控件的整个标头部分，使用控件的`ShowHeader`属性 （如果可用）。

trans-unit.source: You also can customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以自定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>通过设置字段的不同部分的样式属性的对象 （如字体颜色、 背景色等）。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: Style property
trans-unit.target: 样式属性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the child Web server controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 页脚部分的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the header section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 标头部分的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的数据项的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object that displays two fields in the same cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>在相同单元中显示两个字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: The first name and last name fields are combined into the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 名字和姓氏字段组合到同一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数通常用时将字段添加到的动态创建的数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object, define the appropriate templates, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection.
trans-unit.target: 动态地添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象转换为数据绑定控件，创建一个新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象，定义适当的模板，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中，添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 尽管动态可以将字段添加到数据绑定控件，但强烈建议该字段是静态声明，然后显示或隐藏，根据需要。

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 静态声明所有字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>字段列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for displaying the alternating items in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 对象中交替项的模板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />-implemented object that contains the template for displaying the alternating items in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 中交替项的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content displayed for the alternating items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>属性指定为中的交替项显示的自定义内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the alternating items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建指定的交替项的呈现方式的模板中定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> property is commonly used in combination with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A> property to create a different appearance for every other item in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>属性通常与结合使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A>要创建数据绑定控件中的每个其他项不同的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template, first place opening and closing `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `<TemplateField>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定模板，请先打开和关闭`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记`<TemplateField>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，添加到开始和结束之间的自定义内容`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object in the data-bound control contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to access the control.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来访问控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> property to create a custom template for the alternating items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>中的属性创建自定义模板的交替项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>字段列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The template is a variation of the template specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A> property, where an image is displayed on the opposite side of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 模板是指定的模板的变体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A>属性，其中的单元格另一侧显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> object is bound to should be converted to <see langword="null" /> if it is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 对象绑定到的值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 时是否应将其转换为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> is bound to should be converted to <see langword="null" /> when it is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 绑定到的值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 时应将其转换为 <see langword="true" />，则为 <see langword="null" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property applies to two-way data-binding statements made in the template.
trans-unit.target: 此属性适用于在模板中进行双向数据绑定语句。

trans-unit.source: The conversion is done after extracting the values from the two-way bound template, and before passing the values to the data source for an update or insertion operation.
trans-unit.target: 在从双向绑定模板中，和之前的值传递到更新或插入操作的数据源提取这些值之后，执行该转换。

trans-unit.source: For example, a user might enter an empty string ("") for a field value when updating or inserting records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可以输入空字符串 ("") 作为字段值更新或插入记录时。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>属性指定是否为空字符串值自动转换为`null`时数据源中更新数据字段。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> to copy the properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> to.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 的属性将复制到的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />。

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />-derived object to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 派生对象的属性复制到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.CopyProperties%2A> method is a helper method used to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>-derived object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object created by the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.CopyProperties%2A>方法是用于复制的当前属性的帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>-派生对象转换<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>方法创建的对象。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.CopyProperties(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CopyProperties(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.CopyProperties(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CopyProperties(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Always returns a new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回新的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.CreateField%2A> method overrides the base method to return a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.CreateField%2A>方法重写基方法，以返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.CreateField" /> in a derived class, be sure to create a new instance of your type and not call the base method.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.CreateField" />在派生类中，请务必创建你的类型的新实例并调用基方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for displaying an item in edit mode in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置模板，该模板用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 对象中处于编辑模式中的项。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />-implemented object that contains the template for displaying an item in edit mode in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 中处于编辑模式的项的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.EditItemTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content displayed for an item that is in edit mode in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.EditItemTemplate%2A>属性指定处于编辑模式中的项显示的自定义内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how an item in edit mode is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建指定编辑模式中的项的呈现方式的模板中定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.EditItemTemplate%2A> property usually contains input controls for the user to modify a value in a data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.EditItemTemplate%2A>属性通常包含要修改的数据源中的值的用户的输入的控件。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template, first place opening and closing `<EditItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `<TemplateField>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定模板，请先打开和关闭`<EditItemTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记`<TemplateField>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `<EditItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，添加到开始和结束之间的自定义内容`<EditItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object in the data-bound control contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to access the control.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来访问控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.EditItemTemplate%2A> property to create a custom template for an item in edit mode in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.EditItemTemplate%2A>属性处于编辑模式中创建的某个项目的自定义模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>字段列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The template contains validation server controls to prevent a user from leaving a value field empty.
trans-unit.target: 该模板包含验证服务器控件，以防止用户将值字段留空。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> that contains the text or controls of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 的文本或控件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the values of read-only fields are included in the <c>dictionary</c> collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要指示只读字段的值包括在 <c>dictionary</c> 集合中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the value of the data control fields as specified by one or more two-way binding statements (<see langword="DataBind" />) from the current table cell and adds the values to the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 从当前表单元格提取由一个或多个双向绑定语句 (<see langword="DataBind" />) 指定的数据控件字段的值，并将这些值添加到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ExtractValuesFromCell%2A> method is implemented by types derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ExtractValuesFromCell%2A>方法由派生的类型实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to extract the values of two-way data-bound fields in the template to populate dictionaries to be passed to the data source for an update, insert, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法提取模板来填充字典要为更新、 插入或删除操作传递到数据源中的双向数据绑定字段的值。

trans-unit.source: The field/value pair is stored in the dictionary collection that is passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: 字段/值对存储在传递给方法的字典集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ExtractValuesFromCell%2A> method is called by the `ExtractRowValues` method of data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ExtractValuesFromCell%2A>方法由调用`ExtractRowValues`数据方法控件如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for displaying the footer section of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 对象的脚注部分的模板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />-implemented object that contains the template for displaying the footer section of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 的脚注部分的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.FooterTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content displayed in the footer section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.FooterTemplate%2A>属性指定的页脚部分中显示的自定义内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the footer section is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建指定页脚部分的呈现方式的模板中定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template, first place opening and closing `<FooterTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `<TemplateField>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定模板，请先打开和关闭`<FooterTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记`<TemplateField>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `<FooterTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，添加到开始和结束之间的自定义内容`<FooterTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object in the data-bound control contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to access the control.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来访问控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.FooterTemplate%2A> property to create a custom template for the footer section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.FooterTemplate%2A>属性创建自定义模板的页脚部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>中的字段列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The template displays the sum of the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column.
trans-unit.target: 该模板显示中的值的总和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>字段列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for displaying the header section of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 对象的标头部分的模板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />-implemented object that contains the template for displaying the header section of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 的对象，该对象包含用于显示数据绑定控件中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 的标头部分的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.HeaderTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content displayed for the header section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.HeaderTemplate%2A>属性指定标头部分的显示的自定义内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the header section is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建指定的标头部分的呈现方式的模板中定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template, first place opening and closing `<HeaderTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `<TemplateField>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定模板，请先打开和关闭`<HeaderTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记`<TemplateField>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `<HeaderTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，添加到开始和结束之间的自定义内容`<HeaderTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object in the data-bound control contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to access the control.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来访问控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.HeaderTemplate%2A> property to create a custom template for the header section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.HeaderTemplate%2A>属性创建自定义模板的标头部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>中的字段列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The template displays a check box that allows the user to show or hide the rows of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 该模板显示一个复选框，允许用户以显示或隐藏的行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> that contains the text or controls of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 的文本或控件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values, specifying the state of the row that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值之一，指定包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> 的行的状态。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> is contained in.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> 的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Adds text or controls to a cell's controls collection.
trans-unit.target: 将文本或控件添加到单元格的控件集合中。

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are creating a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法创建使用的自定义数据绑定控件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>对象来初始化与数据或控件的表结构的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for displaying an item in insert mode in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置模板，该模板用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 对象中处于插入模式中的项。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />-implemented object that contains the template for displaying an item in insert mode in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 中处于插入模式的项的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.InsertItemTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content displayed for an item in insert mode in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.InsertItemTemplate%2A>属性指定在插入模式中的项显示的自定义内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the item in insert mode is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建一个模板，指定在插入模式中的项的呈现方式定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template, first place opening and closing `<InsertItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `<TemplateField>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定模板，请先打开和关闭`<InsertItemTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记`<TemplateField>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `<InsertItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，添加到开始和结束之间的自定义内容`<InsertItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object in the data-bound control contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to access the control.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来访问控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。

trans-unit.source: Not all data-bound controls support this template This template is supported only by data-bound controls that allow you to insert a record, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有数据绑定控件都支持此模板仅支持数据绑定控件，可用于插入一条记录，类似于此模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.InsertItemTemplate%2A> property to create a custom template for an item in insert mode in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.InsertItemTemplate%2A>属性中插入模式中创建的某个项目的自定义模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>字段中行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The template displays a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control that allows the user to select a value from a predefined list.
trans-unit.target: 该模板显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>允许用户从预定义列表中选择一个值的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for displaying an item in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示数据绑定控件中的项的模板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />-implemented object that contains the template for displaying an item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 中的项的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A> property to specify the custom content displayed for the items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A>属性指定为中的项显示的自定义内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建指定项的呈现方式的模板中定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally define the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> property in combination with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A> property to create a different appearance for every other item in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>属性结合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A>要创建数据绑定控件中的每个其他项不同的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template, first place opening and closing `<ItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `<TemplateField>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定模板，请先打开和关闭`<ItemTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记`<TemplateField>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `<ItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，添加到开始和结束之间的自定义内容`<ItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object in the data-bound control contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to access the control.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来访问控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A> property to create a custom template for the items of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A>属性创建自定义模板的商品<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The template displays the field's value in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control.
trans-unit.target: 该模板显示中的字段的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control validates client input.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定该控件是否验证客户端输入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control validates client input; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件验证客户端输入，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the controls contained in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> object support page callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 确定包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> 对象中的控件是否支持页面回调。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ValidateSupportsCallback%2A> method is not supported for this class and always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ValidateSupportsCallback%2A>方法不支持此类，始终将引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>异常。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用该方法的默认实现。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" /> class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />类可以重写此方法，以指示是否通过字段支持回调所包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示支持回调，实现此方法作为空方法不会引发异常;否则，抛出异常与描述为什么不支持回调的有用消息。
